mapper.sql: SEND_ITEM_ID sendItemId, SEND_ITEM_CODE sendItemCode, IS_ONCE_SEND isOnceSend, SEND_APPLY_ID sendApplyId, APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, INOUTINST_ID inoutinstId, WINDOW_USER_ID windowUserId, WINDOW_USER_NAME windowUserName, WINDOW_HANDLE_TIME windowHandleTime, RECEIVE_MODE receiveMode, ORDER_ID orderId, EXPRESS_NUM expressNum, ADDRESSEE_NAME addresseeName, ADDRESSEE_PHONE addresseePhone, ADDRESSEE_IDCARD addresseeIdcard, ADDRESSEE_ADDR addresseeAddr, ADDRESSEE_PROVINCE addresseeProvince, ADDRESSEE_CITY addresseeCity, ADDRESSEE_COUNTY addresseeCounty, SENDER_NAME senderName, SENDER_PHONE senderPhone, SENDER_ADDR senderAddr, SENDER_PROVINCE senderProvince, SENDER_CITY senderCity, SENDER_COUNTY senderCounty, SMS_TYPE smsType, ISSUE_TIME issueTime, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, IS_CONSIGNER isConsigner, CONSIGNER_ATT_ID consignerAttId
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_SMS_SEND_ITEM
SEND_ITEM_ID = #{sendItemId},
SEND_ITEM_CODE = #{sendItemCode},
IS_ONCE_SEND = #{isOnceSend},
SEND_APPLY_ID = #{sendApplyId},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId},
INOUTINST_ID = #{inoutinstId},
WINDOW_USER_ID = #{windowUserId},
WINDOW_USER_NAME = #{windowUserName},
WINDOW_HANDLE_TIME = #{windowHandleTime},
RECEIVE_MODE = #{receiveMode},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId},
EXPRESS_NUM = #{expressNum},
ADDRESSEE_NAME = #{addresseeName},
ADDRESSEE_PHONE = #{addresseePhone},
ADDRESSEE_IDCARD = #{addresseeIdcard},
ADDRESSEE_ADDR = #{addresseeAddr},
ADDRESSEE_PROVINCE = #{addresseeProvince},
ADDRESSEE_CITY = #{addresseeCity},
ADDRESSEE_COUNTY = #{addresseeCounty},
SENDER_NAME = #{senderName},
SENDER_PHONE = #{senderPhone},
SENDER_ADDR = #{senderAddr},
SENDER_PROVINCE = #{senderProvince},
SENDER_CITY = #{senderCity},
SENDER_COUNTY = #{senderCounty},
SMS_TYPE = #{smsType},
ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
IS_CONSIGNER = #{isConsigner},
CONSIGNER_ATT_ID = #{consignerAttId},
where SEND_ITEM_ID = #{sendItemId}
mapper.insert:
insert into AEA_HI_SMS_SEND_ITEM ( SEND_ITEM_ID ,SEND_ITEM_CODE ,IS_ONCE_SEND ,SEND_APPLY_ID ,APPLYINST_ID ,ITEMINST_ID ,INOUTINST_ID ,WINDOW_USER_ID ,WINDOW_USER_NAME ,WINDOW_HANDLE_TIME ,RECEIVE_MODE ,ORDER_ID ,EXPRESS_NUM ,ADDRESSEE_NAME ,ADDRESSEE_PHONE ,ADDRESSEE_IDCARD ,ADDRESSEE_ADDR ,ADDRESSEE_PROVINCE ,ADDRESSEE_CITY ,ADDRESSEE_COUNTY ,SENDER_NAME ,SENDER_PHONE ,SENDER_ADDR ,SENDER_PROVINCE ,SENDER_CITY ,SENDER_COUNTY ,SMS_TYPE ,ISSUE_TIME ,CREATER ,CREATE_TIME,IS_CONSIGNER,CONSIGNER_ATT_ID,ROOT_ORG_ID )
( SELECT #{hiSmsSendItem.sendItemId},#{hiSmsSendItem.sendItemCode},#{hiSmsSendItem.isOnceSend},#{hiSmsSendItem.sendApplyId},#{hiSmsSendItem.applyinstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.iteminstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.inoutinstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowUserId},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowUserName},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowHandleTime},#{hiSmsSendItem.receiveMode},#{hiSmsSendItem.orderId}, #{hiSmsSendItem.expressNum},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeName},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseePhone},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeIdcard},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeAddr},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeProvince}, #{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeCity},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeCounty},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderName},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderPhone},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderAddr},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderProvince},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderCity},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderCounty},#{hiSmsSendItem.smsType},#{hiSmsSendItem.issueTime},#{hiSmsSendItem.creater}, #{hiSmsSendItem.createTime}, #{hiSmsSendItem.isConsigner},#{hiSmsSendItem.consignerAttId},#{hiSmsSendItem.rootOrgId} FROM dual )
values
( #{hiSmsSendItem.sendItemId},#{hiSmsSendItem.sendItemCode},#{hiSmsSendItem.isOnceSend},#{hiSmsSendItem.sendApplyId},#{hiSmsSendItem.applyinstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.iteminstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.inoutinstId},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowUserId},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowUserName},#{hiSmsSendItem.windowHandleTime},#{hiSmsSendItem.receiveMode},#{hiSmsSendItem.orderId}, #{hiSmsSendItem.expressNum},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeName},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseePhone},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeIdcard},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeAddr},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeProvince}, #{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeCity},#{hiSmsSendItem.addresseeCounty},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderName},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderPhone},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderAddr},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderProvince},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderCity},#{hiSmsSendItem.senderCounty},#{hiSmsSendItem.smsType},#{hiSmsSendItem.issueTime},#{hiSmsSendItem.creater}, #{hiSmsSendItem.createTime}, #{hiSmsSendItem.isConsigner},#{hiSmsSendItem.consignerAttId},#{hiSmsSendItem.rootOrgId} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from AEA_HI_SMS_SEND_ITEM where APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId}
